Bibliographic References: Sotheby, Sale Cat. 4 July 1932, no. 190; PP, no. 119; PPSupp, no. 177.
Imagery Description: (a) Bearded silen moving to 1., holding wreath and kottabosNon Sepcifiedstand, followed by nude Dionysos with phiale and thyrsus, (b) two draped youths 'muffled', with r. hand projecting.
